desc: Picnic is Brooklyn, premiere children's boutique featuring apparel, gifts, toys, accessories and more. Outfitting kids for everyday adventures. Ages newborn - 6 years old.

layout.text: Picnic isn’t just a boutique, it’s a mind set… we want kids to run barefoot in the grass, gaze dreamily up at the clouds and get popsicle stains on their lips. In short, we think kids should be kids.
